title: question about avicus, also hi again.

replies.body:
"Rotation of people"
What does that even mean?

Maybe if you stayed for longer, you'd see that people don't simply come and go.

replies.body: Because people are able to change their names every month. And its gotten to the point where 80% of people feel the need to change it to something unrecognisable.
